post_title: Are there any fellow Ga√∫chos (Porto Alegrenses) in Amsterdam? Would love to meet you!

comments.author: diegorm_rs
comments.body: I know a fucking bunch of them and I am also one, but from Sao Leopoldo. We play football in Amsterdam every week. If you want to join us, drop me a message I can put you in contact with some nice folks and myself.
